MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description:
Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost, efficiency, sales, and net profit. We support Startups in developing 21st century Business Models. Your very own.
We're driven by thousands of independent voters. Altogether, we develop Perfect Desire, an evolving platform of free and simple business plan calculators for everyone.
At Dynamic Applications, we are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain. We vote in online democracy, we deliver for free. We work for you, and we call them Dynamic Applications.
RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer:
For people working on Publication Platforms, Reviewers and Testers. Thank you for all your work. We appreciate it. Your comments define our next idea. This code will convert this product into Perfect Desire, our professional application.
DLROW-III-MODEL 2016 - 2017 - 2018 UNLIMITED UPGRADES

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

OnlineShops.OnlineShops_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to check these sites distribution agreements and decide wether you wish to sell your product through them

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost-benefit optimization.
Site.Site_Description_250: Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost and benefit. We support Startups in quickly checking Business Case options. We develop a platform for free business model calculations. We call them Dynamic Applications.
Site.Site_Description_450: Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost-benefit optimization. We support Startups to quickly check their Business Case. We develop Predicted Desire, an evolving platform for free, interactive micro-business planners for everyone. We call them Dynamic Applications.
Site.Site_Keywords: SocialMedia, 21st century, App, Developer, Internet of Things, PV, Forest, Energy, Truck, Startup, Product, growth, contribution, business, plan, Dynamic Applications, dynamicons, Sharing Economy

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win2000,WinXP,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Windows 8,Windows 10,WinServer,WinOther,Windows2000,Windows2003,Windows Server 2000,Windows Server 2003,Windows Server 2008,Windows Server 2008r2,Windows Server 2012,Windows Tablet PC Edition 2005,Windows Media Center Edition 2005,WinVista,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Ultimate,WinVista x64,Windows Vista Home Basic x64,Windows Vista Home Premium x64,Windows Vista Business x64,Windows Vista Enterprise x64,Windows Vista Ultimate x64
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: Windows 7 / 8 / 10. 1280x768+ Display recommended. No Spyware, no Ads, no Server, no Data gathering.
Program_Info.Limitations: No limitations. There's a public key game that allows everyone to upgrade to Perfect Desire, our Professional Client, for free. The Promo Codes are available in the Twitter competition (@dynamic_idea t @dynamic_qs), so you gotta check a few Tweets.
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: v6.24 - AGB explanations on Art. 7 (eLearning vs. School rights). v6.24 - new icon for Key Account Manager, for our support team. v6.24 - fixed upgrade path and a few more bugs in the application.

Press_Release.Press_Release:
Dynamic Applications releases SocialMedia driven App Developer.
How it works
SocialMedia driven App Developer is capable of calculating basically any Formula System over time, including a Solver Algorithm capable of solving simple Differential Equations. The software will calculate all Targets over time, predict and graphically display a company's proceedings over the next 48 months. Based on the set of Input Parameters and Formula, the user interface is built dynamically by interpretation of the simulation models's equation file.
There's a large number of Input and Target Values included with the Application. Employee Cost, Fixed Cost, Marketing Budget (Adwords), Socialmedia Followers, Website Visitors, 3rd Party Website Downloads, and typical conversion rates from SocialMedia to Website Visitors, to Downloads, to Sales. Any single Input Parameter can be estimated over time. We'll calculate the outcome in Downloads, Sales, Total Cost, and Net Profit.
SocialMedia Followers leading the path of development
Accompanying the Release, which went through a beta phase with hundreds of freelance testers, two SocialMedia Competitions have been started. At @dynamic_idea we allow everyone to suggest, favour, and retweet new simulation ideas. Every Month, Dynamic Applications is working on the top voted idea, and it will be available one (1) month for free after completion.
In parallel to @dynamic_idea, there is a Roadmap, Bug and Feature competition at @dynamic_qs, so users can as well prioritize our Platform Development priorities. We call it Customer Driven Development. Currently working on 2016's user favourite roadmap issue, an adaptable formula system with nothing else needed than the basic Rule of Three.
About Dynamic Applications
Dynamic Applications was founded on 01 January 2016 by Martin Bernhardt. He has also been working with two companies in the Strategic Asset Management market, where he came across the System Dynamics development over time approach. Everything else was researched at Google and Wikipedia.
Dynamic Applications is a community approach. Pay with a Tweet, and define the next big thing we publish.
Dynamic Applications has no flyers, sales consultants, traditional marketing, or budget. Our strategy is called Growth Hacking: we spend as much time as possible on Research and Development of the Software. Following an Agile Development approach, we're working our way all up from the very bottom. We start from crap and make it better, every day. So everyone can be part of the game of our own Business Case development. And this way, we offer an exceptional business case for everyone: free software.
We are Dynamic Applications. We work to empower people. We are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain.

Press_Release.Headline: Dynamic Applications releases SocialMedia driven App Developer.
Press_Release.Summary: App developer calculates the Business Plan of a Shareware or App Developer over 48 months, with Website Visitors, Total Downloads, Revenue, Cost and Profit.
Press_Release.Keywords: SocialMedia, App, Developer, Programmer, Freeware, Shareware, Expansion, Downloads, Success, Cost, Revenue, Net Profit, Dynamic Applications, Sharing Economy.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: This software is published under a Creative Commons cc-by-sa alike license, free to share. See EULA for details.

English.Keywords: Dynamic Applications, App, Developer, Sharing Economy, Internet, Software, Programmer, SocialMedia, Downloads, Targets, Plan, Profit, Success, Freeware, Shareware, dynamicons, System Dynamics
English.Char_Desc_80: SocialMedia driven App Developer Business Case Simulation
English.Char_Desc_250: The SocialMedia driven App Developer is a small business planner for Freeware, Shareware and App developers. Fine-tune as many parameters as you want. Estimate Downloads. Expand worldwide. See revenue and net profit results displayed over 48 months.
English.Char_Desc_450: SocialMedia driven App Developer is a business planner for the 21st century Freeware, Shareware and App developer. Fine-tune as many cost, reach, and sales parameters as you want. See company revenue and net profit predictions over 48 months. It allows for a complete Return-on-Invest calculation and allows to get a quick overview over any possible scenario optimizations.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
SocialMedia driven App Developer is an interactive business planner for the 21st century Freeware, Shareware or App developer.
Fine-tune cost-driving, reach, efficiency and sales parameters as you want. See their combined effect on Downloads, Sales, Net Profit and Total Cost. Fine-tune any value over time in various modes, including exponential growth, with live evaluation. App Developer allows for a complete Return-on-Invest analysis. Quickly check any possibilities and options.
Let go of the past. Start today and think only about what's possible to achieve within the next 4 years. An IoT developer model is included for developers who calculate a hardware component as well.
Input Values: Employees, Salary per hour, Work hours, Work days - Fixed Cost, Fixed Income - Sales Taxes - Adwords, SocialMedia Followers, Follower to Website to Downloads to Sales conversion rates, 3rd party Website downloads, App Retail Price.
Target Values: App Downloads, Sales - Daily/Monthly Revenue, Net Income - Website Visitors, Downloads - Adword Impressions, Clicks - Total Cost, Revenue, Net Income, Net Profit - All-Time Downloads, Revenue, and Bank Account Balance.
Dynamic Applications are fully Transparent. All Simulation Models are documented with ToolTips + online docs. Dynamic Applications fully protect your privacy. No Adware. No Spyware. No Server behind you. It's your business, it's your data.
Dynamic Applications are participative. In a pursuit of Customer Driven Development, two user competitions allow everyone to vote with Retweets and Favs on Twitter, on our best simulation ideas to do, as well as on the platform roadmap. The top voted simulation ideas and the top favorite platform features are prioritized in development, then published free of charge, in a 2-4 week cycle.
All in all, Startup Product Manager is a reliable software application for planning and managing your business.
